as several others have said, Lux is in her late teens to her early 20s. Somewhere between 18-22.

The models are designed so that their silhouettes when viewed at the three-quarters camera angle League uses are the correct size, not their actual proportions. Take {{Champion:10}}, for example - have her land (say for her Aether Wing dance) and you can see that she's actually *tiny* compared to most of the champions. She barely comes up to many of the other champion's belly buttons.
